Name: Exchange-operator relationship
Description: The relationship between a financial exchange (stock exchange, futures market, ECN, etc.) and the organization that operates it.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: Start date of the exchange operation relationship.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: End date (only if this is a historical relationship) of the exchange operation relationship.

Properties.Name: Exchange
Properties.Description: The exchange operated by the organization.
